entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `!` does not suppress nullable warning from spread element type #75560
  • Msbuild failed when processing the file. Message: The task "ResolveComReference" is not supported on the .NET Core version of MSBuild #75558

Closed

  • LightBulb Preview buffer leaks via LSP #75492
  • WorkspaceRegistration.RaiseEvents is broken #23474
    Backlog
  • Use-Auto-Property may need updating for struct-types fields used with ref-this extensions methods. #23257
    Backlog
  • Flaky test: TestGetDiagnostics2 #23188
    Backlog
  • Intellisense not properly picking up model members when using @model IEnumerable <type> #23040
    Backlog
  • Compatibility between Microsoft.Code.Anaysis and netCore apps #20299
    Backlog
  • [Completion] Easy to accidentally commit wrong completion value for extension methods #24044
    Backlog
  • Code Style: enforce named arguments for literals #19186
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Set text selection after the refactoring is applied. #23604
    Backlog
  • Quick info whitespace and sizing issue #23781
    Backlog
  • VisualStudioIntegrationTests throw System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException : Command "View.ShowSmartTag" is not available. #21750
    Backlog
  • Multiple line cursor inserting spaces for only last selected line when pasting items #23328
    Backlog
  • Possible refactoring: turn task.Result into await #22982
    Backlog
  • Formatting throws an unhandled NullReferenceException after upgrading to 2.x #22870
    Backlog
  • VB: Editor should provide option to preserve whitespace around assignment operator. #22818
    Backlog
  • Define expectations for non-EditorConfig option storage #18817
    Backlog
  • System.NullReferenceException is thrown at Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.UnitTests.Workspaces.TestWorkspace.Dispose #21710
    Backlog
  • Exception on Mono: Msbuild failed when processing the file '.csproj' with message: Operation is not supported on this platform. #21609
    Backlog
  • Ubuntu : Document count is 0 for project opened using OpenProjectAsync using Mono #21419
    Backlog
  • MEF and Workspaces crash with ReflectionTypeLoadException on Mono #20275
    Backlog
  • Calling ExpandAsync on Visual Basic MemberAccessExpressionSyntax with a call to a constructor renames 'New' to '[New]' #19864
    Backlog
  • Investigate behavior of "orphan" files during a code fix #19952
    Backlog
  • Deterministic property in msbuild is ignored in loaded project options #19651
    Backlog
  • Move type to file duplicates assembly level attributes #19707
    Backlog
  • VB: Intellisense for members of delegates created as lambda expressions in With-statement. #19337
    Backlog
  • Handle special edge case in simplification #19368
    Backlog
  • Smart variable naming creating conflicts #19261
    Backlog
  • Autocomplete inserts unnecessary qualified name of type when member is of the same name #19011
    Backlog
  • VS Integration tests should install an AssertListener in the VS process #18704
    Backlog
  • Generate Constructor: doesn't offer to pick base members for new location #18439
    Backlog
  • FAR results in Web Application projects could use improvement #18382
    Backlog
  • Resolve usings won't resolve for internalsvisible interfaces #18233
    Backlog
  • VB: Move Type to File carries over wrong XML Comments when code file starts with a Delegate. #17879
    Backlog
  • Fix usage of Experimental/InstalledByMSI flags in *.vsixmanifest files. #17538
    Backlog
  • Refactoring: Simplify name incorrectly applies the wrong fix #17396
    Backlog
  • Convert to interpolated string doesn't work for concatenated strings #17215
    Backlog
  • Generate Constructor defaults to fields and not auto-props #17087
    Backlog
  • Override completion issue when committing with parenthesis #16770
    Backlog
  • Undo doesn't work after suppressing a diagnostic in a newly created GlobalSuppression.cs #16691
    Backlog
  • All IDE "Suggestion" diagnostics are shown as "Hidden" in the ruleset editor #16695
    Backlog
  • Convert to Interpolated String leaves newlines in parenthesized expressions #16251
    Backlog
  • Wrong IntelliSense list in nested With statement #15878
    Backlog
  • Encapsulate field consecutive capital letters #15987
    Backlog
  • Can't search VS options for "Suggest usings for types in NuGet packages" #14975
    Backlog
  • Remove IVT from MS.VS.LanagageServices to CodeLens once we stop supporting Roslyn.sln on Dev14 #13627
    Backlog
  • Wrong overload in intellisense in C# #7898
    Backlog
  • [nuget add using] can't resolve a fully qualified type name #8730
    Backlog
  • Feature request to improve the light bulb experience when multiple issues present in a line of code #5384
    Backlog
  • Loading Microsoft/CodeContracts with MsBuildWorkspace will hit assertion #3926
    Backlog
  • Duplicate code fixes reported if analyzer reference is installed as a VSIX as well as a nuget reference #4030
    Backlog
  • Expose Signature Help API #3540
    Backlog
  • project.OutputFilePath is null #22732
    Backlog
  • Need an integration test for lightweight solution load. #17430
    Backlog
  • 4 VSI tests skipped due to ErrorListPackage load failure blocking VSI runs #13032
    Backlog
  • Test VS crash in BasicGoToDefinition.ObjectBrowserNavigation or BasicGenerateTypeDialog.BasicToCSharp, followed by lots of test failures #21009
    Backlog
  • Failing test: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.UnitTests.Structure.StructureTaggerTests.CSharpOutliningTagger_RegionIsDefinition #20106
    Backlog
  • No information on completion in xml tag in xml doc #22720
    Backlog
  • Code Style: Analyzer + Code fix for spacing #7067
    Backlog
  • RPS and Jenkins should be isolated from Elfie database updates #9589
    Backlog
  • Go To Implementation does not focus window if covered #22083
    Backlog
  • Provide extensibility system to map custom completion tags to completion images+filters #18649
    Backlog
  • [Suggestion] Find all references filter and/or grouping for XML comments #18641
    Backlog
  • Inlining ref returns scenario needs to be enabled through IDE #17132
    Backlog
  • Convert unsigned decimal to hexadecimal in Visual Basic #20982
    Backlog
  • Use different editorconfig files for build configurations #21332
    Backlog
  • ReplacementChangesSemantics fails to detect certain breaking changes #20698
    Backlog
  • VB: Editor should NOT automatically remove digit grouping character for decimal literals. #22627
    Backlog
  • Get warning after update all dependencies for package Microsoft.CodeAnalysis on Visual Studio 2017 #22290
    Backlog
  • Having an item that is both a source file and an additional item breaks DPL and CPS #19968
    Backlog
  • A small usability tweak for F2 - Automatically discard surrounding whitespace in requested new name #22544
    Backlog
  • VS crash: ArgumentException from ExternalErrorDiagnosticUpdateSource.AddNewErrors #22522
    Backlog
  • Using Roslyn to analyze a .NET Framework project with .NET Core #22415
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Offer to Implement Interfaces or Abstract Class from within type body #22401
    Backlog
  • Fix all for simplify name distinguishes between constructors and static member accesses #22713
    Backlog
  • Simplifier.Expand() generates incorrect node for Linq extension method invocation #20311
    Backlog
  • EnvDTE.CodeElement.GetStartPoint(vsCMPartBody)/GetEndPoint(vsCMPartBody) throw COMException for expression-bodied methods and properties #21306
    Backlog
  • VB.NET: using predefined type name as field name in value tuple automatically replaced by framework type name #21661
    Backlog
  • "Tested by data point" in CodeLens is failing because RemoteCodeLensReferencesService is returning a collection containing nulls #20131
    Backlog
  • ExpandSelection/ReduceSelection Option #22590
    Backlog
  • Typing (or overtyping) the close paren of a using statement indents the next line #22508
    Backlog
  • GlobalOptionService.SetOptions doesn't support non-WorkspaceOptionSet #15122
    Backlog
  • Implement abstract class ignores language version #19684
    Backlog
  • Better quickinfo for nullable operators #21494
    Backlog
  • Offer "using static" from unbound members to their types #22099
    Backlog
  • Caret incorrectly placed in virtual space after enter with non-standard tab/indent widths #21919
    Backlog
  • Suggest names for VB variables. #21621
    Backlog
  • Feature Request: Offer built-in fix to convert static call to extension method to instance call #21483
    Backlog
  • [Completion] Request to add a new tag for static and maybe other modifiers. #21345
    Backlog
  • Add Parameter to Constructor doesn't generate unique names w.r.t. locals defined in the constructor #21112
    Backlog
  • Fix All for "Insert Digit Separators" and "Change base for numeric literals" would be nice #21116
    Backlog
  • Update "Add Parameter to Constructor" to allow adding multiple parameters at once #21113
    Backlog
  • Remove Unused Variable does not consider other targets/heads #21085
    Backlog
  • Generate Overrides allows member ordering in the UI but doesn't obey the chosen ordering #21081
    Backlog
  • Suggestion: Have option for intellisense to display method parameters on new lines for readability #21036
    Backlog
  • Add null check should trigger snippet mode so that I know that I need to edit the code it just added #21001
    Backlog
  • Friend vs internal in dotnet_naming_symbols.*.applicable_accessibilities #20893
    Backlog
  • NamedParameterCompletionProvider could mandate named arguments after an out-of-position argument #20657
    Backlog
  • [Suggestion] Cursor insertion mode #20328
    Backlog
  • Show autocomplete for well-known xml namespaces in VB xml literals #20251
    Backlog
  • Validate the new root is a CompilationUnitSyntax in Document.WithSyntaxRoot #20082
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Prefer Cancel() rather than Commit() when rename is async. #75562
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownloadAndReference to avoid including msbuild dependencies #75561
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid unnecessary tail increment in collection expressions codegen #75559
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Prototype string literals in data section #75557
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Dispose of ITextDocument(s) when closing preview view #75551
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: nullable analysis of spread element expression #74686
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, New Language Feature - File-Local Types, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • VB: Do not use overload resolution for expression tree conversion #75490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Access services on Solution rather than workspace in Razor cohost (Roslyn OOP) scenarios #75545
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Change commit to async when enter is pressed #75335
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Migrate Codelens provider to .NET #74321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [WIP] Pass `runningProject` to `GetUpdateAsync` and get projectToRebuild and projectToRestart back #75503
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not lex `..` as a single DotDotToken #75549
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revise expression parsing #75553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache checksum computation at an collection-element level #75479
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [release/dev17.12] EE: Handle notification when metadata has been invalidated (#75423) #75518
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Platform - Mono CoreClr
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #75555
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
